div.p: Experience warm Kashmiri hospitality at Conifer View Guest House
Tangmarg - Gateway to Gulmarg
30-40 minutes drive
Excellent guest reviews
Private on-site parking
Authentic Kashmiri hospitality

Conifer View Guest House is a cozy mountain homestay in Tangmarg — the peaceful gateway to Gulmarg. Set on Iqbal Colony Road, our house offers warm Kashmiri hospitality, clean comfortable rooms, and stunning views of pine-clad slopes.

Whether you're here for gondola rides, skiing in winter, or exploring Drung Waterfall, our family-run guest house provides the perfect "home away from home" experience in the heart of Kashmir's natural beauty.

img.alt: Conifer View Guest House exterior view showing the building surrounded by pine trees

div.p: Everything you need for a comfortable stay in Kashmir
Private on-site parking available for all guests
Delicious Kashmiri breakfast served in your room
Beautiful outdoor spaces to relax and enjoy mountain views
Stay connected with complimentary high-speed internet
Our family is always available to assist you
Easy access to Gulmarg ski slopes and winter sports
Clean, cozy rooms with all essential amenities

During heavy snowfall, the Tangmarg–Gulmarg road may require snow chains or 4×4 vehicles. We provide up-to-date road condition information and can arrange transportation assistance. Contact us for current weather and road updates.
